name: Talking Taxi Parking Simulator 3D
description:
Talking Taxi Parking Simulator 3D

In this taxi driver super fun simulator game you are going to experience what is duty Moter driver in the beautifully designed 3d city environment.
Play the latest and most exciting Car driving simulation game with just one tap…..!!!
In this Talking Taxi Parking Simulator 3D game you and your kids can try to be the parking king of the cartoon world.
Car simulator game provides you the extreme driving experience with learning tactics of transport cab driving and parking in the fast and furious condition.
In the first mode you have to pick n drop all the given pessengers from one place to another n if you do that with in time.
It is a parking game that you can download and play for free!

Features

* taxi driver fantastic n super cool modes with fun to earn as much as u can.
* taxi parking drive passengers around the city from heavy city traffic.
* car skids drive the taxi with tuned n powerful engine.
* Funny and exciting parking missions
* Fun for everyone
